step_data.thought: Now that I've clicked on the STORES menu, I see a dropdown menu with various options. Looking at the menu structure, I can see there's an 'All Stores' option under 'Settings' with ID 505. This is likely where I can view all the available store views in the system. I should click on this option to see the store hierarchy, which should show me what store views are available for sending welcome emails.
